article:
There were two hours before landing in Florida.I was going to meet my   _  .It was my first time in the United States.Mother said I was   _   to learn English in Florida,but the main   _   for coming to Florida was to visit my sister,not to learn English.
The plane had   _  !I started running when I   _   my sister!"Oh,you little girl," she said!She had changed her style  ,  _  living there for two years.She was   _   a sweater and color1ed jeans.
We went back to her apartment.I was very   _  ,so I fell asleep quickly.Tomorrow would be an exciting day!
My sister didn't go to work that day because she had taken the day   _  .We went to Disney's Epcot Center to   look  around   all the different buildings.Being tired and hungry,we decided to  _  .The food was different from what I was used to and there was a lot to  _  from.She showed me her favorite store and we went to buy all the   _   I wanted.I was having the best   _   of my life.It was late when we came home that night;I went   _   to bed.
Three days flew by.When my sister took me to the   _  ,she said,"I'm going to miss you."I was so touched   _   she had never told me   _   like that before.
On the plane I was looking forward to seeing all my friends,telling them about this   _   vacation and showing them all my new clothes!I was very happy   _   this trip!
